dt-example.title: Buttons - selection control
dt-example.info:
Select provides a number of buttons that can be used with the [Buttons extension](https://datatables.net/extensions/buttons) for DataTables. Buttons is a framework providing common options, styling and API methods for buttons that can control a DataTable.
The selection control buttons made available by Select are:
* `se-button selected` - Enabled only when one or more items are selected * `se-button selectedSingle` - Enabled only when a single item is selected * `se-button selectAll` - Select all rows * `se-button selectNone` - Deselect all rows * `se-button selectRows` - Select rows * `se-button selectColumns` - Select columns * `se-button selectCells` - Select cells
All of these button types are demonstrated in this example.
